ModMetaData.name: Kit's Portuguese Pack
ModMetaData.author: Kitsune, vermibvs
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to add portuguese translation to some mods :)
Supported Mods: - [KV] Consolidated Traits - [KV] Faction Control - [KV] More Traits Slots - [KV] Show Hair With Hats or Hide All Hats - [O21] Seamless Embrasures - [O21] Toolbox - [SYR] Doormats - [SYR] Harvest Yield - [SYR] Scar Removal Plus - [SYR] Set Up Camp - [T] MoreFloors - A Dog Said...
